greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Multiplication table of the Fibonacci numbers read by antidiagonals.
comment: Same as triangle T(n,k) = F(n)-F(k)*F(n-k+1), read by rows, F(i) = A000045(i). - _Dale Gerdemann_, Apr 24 2016
link: Michael De Vlieger, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..11324 (rows 0 <= n <= 149, flattened)
mathematica: Table[Fibonacci[n] - Fibonacci[k]*Fibonacci[n - k + 1], {n, 13}, {k, n}] // Flatten (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Dec 11 2020 *)
results.author: Douglas Stones (dssto1(AT)student.monash.edu.au), Sep 04 2004
